description.en:
### Our Multi Training Scenario

1.) Kuriika Smell! (クリイカすめる！); Comic Shingeki 2013-12
2.) Dieting With My Childhood Friend! / Osananajimi to Diet! (幼馴染とダイエッと！); Comic Shingeki 2012-08

8.) Trouble Waitress (とらぶるウェイトレス); Comic Shingeki 2012-04
